td.content: s:pt presents with 4 weeks history of mild long standing inability to ride on elevators due to overwhelming fear accompanied by palpitations, diaphoresis and dyspnea, mild feelings of terror in social situations and Mental Health. pt is a 36 yo f genealogist. smokes one pack/day she is a heavy drinker o:Height 157 cm, Weight 69.9 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 14 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.
